name: UwUWaterwoo
description:
Got no match again from the Aphrodite Project? Can't find anyone to talk to? Or just simply bored out of your mind?

Try out the uWaterloo dating sim!

Meet six different girls from each of the six faculties here at uWaterloo! Talk with them while exploring the life of a first-year student here at Waterloo in this visual novel.

Game Information:

  • Around playtime of around 45 minutes to 1 hour casually. Likely 1 hour 15 minutes to 1 hour 30 minutes if you want to see all endings and unique dialogue.
  • Not voiced, but it does include sound and music
  • The main character's gender has been purposely left ambiguous. Feel free to play as any gender you desire.
  • Faculty programs were chosen to try to shine some light on less commonly talked about programs
  • Personality types were chosen based on the general consensus of comments on /r/uwaterloo
  • Try setting your name to the name of an infamous goose for an extra secret!
  • Try setting your name to Rick!

Disclaimers and Credits: 

  • Not affiliated with the University of Waterloo, this was just a fun project done on the side
  • All characters were originally designed by /u/alyssnya and edited with photo editing
  • Check out the original post that kickstarted the idea off. Shoutout to the original developer for starting the project.
  • Made with Ren'Py

Includes PC, Mac, and Linux downloads. Playtested on PC and Mac by my S/O and I.

Enjoy and have fun! :)
